channel.title: Removing the music tab?
channel.description: Hey, any1 know how to remove the music tab?

item.title: Removing the music tab?
item.dc:creator: @tedyslilnoob tedyslilnoob
item.description:
@tedyslilnoob wrote:

then do this:

replace with:

setSidebarInterface(13, 1); // harp tab

item.title: Removing the music tab?
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

I did it, but it didn’t do anything…

[code] outStream.createFrame(107); // resets something in the client

	setSidebarInterface(1, 3917);
	setSidebarInterface(2, 638);
	setSidebarInterface(3, 3213);
	setSidebarInterface(4, 1644);
	setSidebarInterface(5, 5608);
            if(ancients == 0)
            {
	setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
	setSidebarInterface(7, 12855);
            }
            if(ancients == 1)
            {
	setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
	setSidebarInterface(7, 1151);
            }
	setSidebarInterface(7, 12855);		// what is this?
	setSidebarInterface(8, 5065);
	setSidebarInterface(9, 5715); 
	setSidebarInterface(10, 2449);
	setSidebarInterface(11, 904);
	setSidebarInterface(12, 147);
	//setSidebarInterface(13, 962);
	setSidebarInterface(0, 2423);

[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Removing the music tab?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Yup, its easy.

Go to your initiliaze method and comment out the line with the interface 13, it has some numbers then a comma then 13. Comment it out. I did it for prayer icon.

EDIT: Exact code.

setSidebarInterface(13, 962);

Comment it out like so:

//setSidebarInterface(13, 962);

Read full topic
